Text: E̩gba le̩ ma adu ojane̩ e-efojale wawe abigbe̩le̩ me̩gwa ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, ku ma mʼagege-ma ko ledufu aledo o̩ko̩ya etito̩.
E̩lu ef uma chʼame̩ne̩fule̩fu, one̩ me̩lu-ma la chʼamanibe.
Todu ame̩ne̩fule̩fu le̩ mʼagege-ma ko, ma la nʼekpo manyʼu n.
Amanibe muda nʼekpo ef uli-ma manyʼagege-ma.
Oñ abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ le̩ che̩du ewa, olu chane̩ ago ma chaka taku ma kwololu.
Oñ alumeji odu ukwa dago kakini, Me̩ go, o̩ko̩ya etito̩ de̩-oo! Me̩ dufu wa ale-dʼo.
E̩gba le̩ abigbe̩le̩ le̩ chaka kwane̩, oñ ma ñwʼowu agege-ma che.
Tak ame̩ne̩fule̩fu ka ñw amanibe le̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼekpo-me̩ ba ñw a, todabu kʼagege-wa alu.
Ama amanibe le̩ dohi kakini, Tode̩gba kʼi ma bʼawa kpʼame̩ jo̩ n; me̩ nyʼugbo abo ku ma tʼekpo ku me̩ la ñw o̩la-me̩.
Oñ ubi ma abu ku ma nyʼala, o̩ko̩ya etito̩ le̩ lewa. Tak abo kʼo̩la-ma chʼe̩mu tane̩ mugudu nyʼugbo uje̩wñ iyawo kpai owñ, oñ ma fʼo̩na re.
Ubi le̩ abigbe̩le̩ ki bo̩ ño̩ lewa ge̩; ma kakini, Odu, odu, mʼo̩na bi ñw a.
Ama i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, U ma me̩ n.
Todule̩ me̩ ki gwe̩ke̩ adide, todabu ku me̩ ma ma o̩jo̩-wñ abe̩k iko-wñ n.
Todu alu kʼone̩ kʼi anyʼule̩ fʼamadu e-wñ do̩ wa kʼi la kʼane̩-wñ nyʼuma o̩wo̩;
i la mʼejika me̩gwa ko ñw e̩ne̩ʼka, oñ i kʼe̩le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩, i la kʼeji ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩; i ko ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼibe-wñ bo̩jo̩, tak i le tʼule̩-wñ.
Oñ ababa le̩ e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika me̩gwa le nachinyama; i la jʼile ejika me̩gwa omune̩ manyʼu.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ ki gba e̩le̩ fʼile ejika me̩le̩ je̩ manyʼu.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki gbʼeji le̩ le nafʼura gwa, oñ i kʼo̩ko̩ odu-wñ maja o̩mo̩.
Tak i kpo̩kpe̩ gboogbo, odu amadu le̩ lewa, oñ i fʼo̩la o̩ko̩ le̩ lo kpai ama.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki mʼejika me̩gwa gba lewa, oñ i mʼejika me̩gwa omune̩ ko wa manyʼu; i kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ mʼejika me̩gwa ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩, go, u ño̩ fʼejika me̩gwa omune̩ je̩ manyʼu ge̩.
Odu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩! uwe̩, adu ki nyo̩ ki achubi one̩. E̩ chubi-mi ef e̩wñ re me̩, nadʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ nʼo̩da e̩wñ wewe; mugudu wʼef uyo̩ odu-we̩ ke.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika me̩le̩ le̩ ño̩ lewa; i kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ mʼejika me̩le̩ ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩; go, u ño̩ file me̩le̩ je̩ mʼo̩.
Odu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩! uwe̩, adu ki nyo̩ kʼi achubi one̩. E̩ chubi-mi ef e̩wñ re me̩, nadʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ nʼo̩da e̩wñ wewe; mugudu wʼef uyo̩ odu-we̩ ke.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika meji le̩ ño̩ lewa; i kakini, Odu-mi, u chema uwe̩, kʼe̩ chʼagbiti; ugbo kʼe̩ ma gbe̩ n, e̩ ja; ugbo ki ma chʼuwe̩ fiatuka n, e̩ yajo̩ kwʼo̩mo̩;
oñ abu kʼu narailo, u le namʼe̩jika-we̩ du maja ef ane̩; go, e̩wñ-we̩ de̩-i.
Oñ odu-wñ dohi ñw u kakini, Adu bibi kʼe̩ chʼo̩kpo̩! E̩ chema kʼomi aja ugbo ki ma chʼomi gbe̩ n, u lañʼayajo̩ ugbo ki ma chʼomi fiatuka n;
todule̩ i ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ mʼo̩ko̩-mi ko ñw abo ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ ta, tak omi ma wa agba e̩wñ-mi manyʼile oji-wñ.
Todule̩ me̩ bʼowñ gba ejika meji le̩ ku me̩ mʼu ko ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼejika ogu le̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼe̩wñ, ma ñʼadʼu manyʼu ñw u ge̩, tak i ane̩ ololo; ama e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n tʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ ma abʼo̩ gba.
Me̩ dʼadu ki ma chʼeku ñw one̩ n le̩ rikpolo tef e̩chubi o̩do̩da; o̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpai enyi e̩lo̩ ade̩.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba du kʼO̩ma One̩ lewa ef ojima-wñ kpai amonuche̩-wñ du ubi-wñ, e̩gba le̩ i agugu oj ede ojima-wñ.
Taku ma akʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du wa jʼo̩gba-wñ. Oñ i ada ma ru bʼomune̩ te̩, alu kʼadide ala adʼamala ru bʼamewo te̩;
tak i akʼamala jo̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ; amewo muda ajo̩ awohi-wñ.
E̩gba le̩ Onu aka ñw abo ku ma jo̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ lewa, ame̩ kʼAta-mi de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ le̩. Me̩ ki fʼojane̩ ku ma ñwo̩che tane̩ ñwu me̩ akwe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i je̩ ogu:
todu ebi kpa mi, oñ me̩ dʼe̩wñ ñwu mi je̩; alugbe̩ kpa mi, oñ me̩ dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩; u chʼononojo, me̩ gba mi uru;
u tago ofo, oñ me̩ kʼukpo ñwu mi lo; u chʼe̩ne̩gbo, oñ me̩ lewa fejudo mi; u dʼef unyidudu, oñ me̩ wʼugbo mi.
E̩gba le̩ abo̩kpakpa adʼohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩gba oñ a li kʼebi akpʼe̩ kʼa la dʼe̩wñ ñw e̩ je̩? abe̩k alugbe̩ akpʼe̩, tak a dʼomi ñw e̩ ñmo̩?
E̩gba oñ a li uwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼononojo tak a gbʼe̩ ru? abe̩k e̩ tago ofo tak a kʼukpo ñw e̩ lʼago?
Oñ e̩gba a li uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼe̩gbo o̩la, abe̩k e̩ dʼef unyidudu, tak a wʼugbo we̩?
Tak Onu le̩ adohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ukpe̩ ku me̩ che ñw e̩ne̩ ki nyaʼka ef amo̩maye-mi-i, mak omi me̩ che ñwu.
E̩gba le̩ i aka ñw abo ku ma jʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ kakini, Me̩ kwo bʼumi te̩, ame̩ ku ma nama ñwu me̩-i tef una e-ogbegbele̩ ku ma ñwo̩che tane̩ todu Abulumone̩ kpai amonuche̩-wñ.
Todu, ebi kpa mi, me̩ la dʼe̩wñ ñwu mi je̩ n; alugbe̩ kpa mi, me̩ la dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩ n;
u chʼononojo, me̩ la gba mi uru n; u tago ofo, me̩ la kʼukpo ñwu mi lo n; i lo̩ mi n, u laño̩ dʼef unyidudu, me̩ la wa fejudo mi n.
Tak ama ñʼadohi kakini, Ondu, e̩gba oñ a li uwe̩ kʼebi nakpʼe̩? abe̩k alugbe̩? abe̩k uwe̩ chʼononojo? abe̩k e̩ tago ofo? abe̩k i ma lo̩ we̩ n? abe̩k e̩ dʼef unyidudu? kʼa ma la che e̩wñ ñw e̩ n?
Tak i adohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩-i ka kʼukpe̩ ku me̩ ma che ñw e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ki nya-i n, me̩ la che ñwu mi n.
Abo le̩ la akwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼef udu ogbegbele̩ echi; abo̩kpakpa muda alo tʼef iñmi e-ogbegbele̩.
